name: SubhanAllah
translation: Glory be to Allah

name: Alhamdulillah
translation: All praise is for Allah

name: Allahu Akbar
translation: Allah is the Greatest

name: La ilaha illallah
translation: There is no god except Allah

name: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi
translation: Glory be to Allah and with His praise

name: SubhanAllahi al-Azim
translation: Glory be to Allah, the Magnificent

name: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi, SubhanAllahi al-Azim
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ الْعَظِيمِ
translation: Glory be to Allah with His praise; Glory be to Allah, the Magnificent

name: Astaghfirullah
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah

name: Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh
translation: I seek Allah's forgiveness and turn to Him in repentance

name: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ
transliteration: Lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāh
translation: No power or might except by Allah

name: Hasbiyallahu wa ni'mal wakil
translation: Allah is sufficient for me and the best Disposer of affairs

name: La ilaha illa Anta Subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Anta Subḥānaka innī kuntu minaẓ-ẓālimīn
translation: None has the right to be worshiped but You; Glory be to You; indeed I was of the wrongdoers

name: Salawat short
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad

name: Salawat full
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ وَسَلِّمْ عَلَى نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ
transliteration: Allāhumma ṣalli wa sallim ʿalā nabiyyinā Muḥammad
translation: O Allah, send blessings and peace upon our Prophet Muhammad

name: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi 'adada khalqihi
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ وَرِضَا نَفْسِهِ وَزِنَةَ عَرْشِهِ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ
transliteration: Subḥānallāhi wa biḥamdih ʿadada khalqih, wa riḍā nafsih, wa zinata ʿarshih, wa midāda kalimātih
translation: Glory be to Allah and His praise as numerous as His creation, as He is pleased, as heavy as His Throne, and as plenty as the ink of His words

name: Rabbighfir li
translation: My Lord, forgive me

name: Rabbi zidni ilma
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge

name: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanah
translation: Our Lord, give us in this world good

name: wa fil-akhirati hasanah wa qina 'adhaban-nar
arabic: وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
transliteration: wa fīl-ākhirati ḥasanah wa qinā ʿadhāban-nār
translation: and in the Hereafter good, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

name: Rabbana zalamna anfusana
translation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves

name: Rabbi yassir wa la tu'assir
translation: My Lord, make it easy and not difficult

name: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika
translation: O Allah, help me to remember You

name: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatik
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
transliteration: Allāhumma aʿinnī ʿalā dhikrik wa shukrik wa ḥusni ʿibādatik
translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, thank You, and worship You well

name: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-'afwa wal-'afiyah
translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being

name: Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal mawla
translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best Protector

name: Subhanallah walhamdulillah wallahu akbar
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ وَاللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation: Glory to Allah, praise to Allah, Allah is Greatest

name: Subhanallah walhamdulillah wala ilaha illallah wallahu akbar
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ وَلَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَاللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ
transliteration: Subḥānallāh wal-ḥamdu lillāh wa lā ilāha illā Allāh wallāhu akbar
translation: Glory, praise, no god but Allah, Allah is Greatest

name: Subhanallah 'adada ma khalaq
translation: Glory be to Allah as many as He created

name: Alhamdulillah kathiran
translation: Much praise is due to Allah

name: Allahu Akbar kabiran
translation: Allah is the Greatest, tremendously so

name: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah
arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Allāhu waḥdahū lā sharīka lah
translation: No god but Allah alone, without partner

name: Lahul-mulku walahul-hamd
translation: His is the Kingdom and praise

name: Wahuwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir
translation: And He is over all things Powerful

name: Subhanal Malikil Quddus
translation: Glory be to the King, the Most Holy

name: Subhanal Hayyil Qayyum
translation: Glory be to the Ever-Living, the Sustainer

name: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyum
translation: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer

name: Ya Rahman Ya Rahim
translation: O Most Merciful, O Most Compassionate

name: Ya Ghafur Ya Ghaffar
translation: O All-Forgiving, O Oft-Forgiving

name: Ya Razzaq
translation: O Provider

name: Ya Latif
translation: O Most Subtle, Kind

name: Ya Wadud
translation: O Most Loving

name: Ya Fattah
translation: O Opener

name: Ya Alim
translation: O All-Knowing

name: Ya Sami' Ya Basir
translation: O All-Hearing, O All-Seeing

name: La ilaha illallah al-Malikul Haqq
arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ الْمَلِكُ الْحَقُّ
translation: No god but Allah, the True King

name: Subhanallahi wabihamdih subhanallahil 'azim wa bihamdih
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ الْعَظِيمِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
transliteration: Subḥānallāhi wa biḥamdih, subḥānallāhil-ʿaẓīm wa biḥamdih
translation: Glory be to Allah with His praise; Glory be to Allah, the Magnificent, with His praise

name: Astaghfirullah al-'Azim alladhi la ilaha illa Huwa al-Hayyul-Qayyum wa atubu ilayh
arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّٰهَ الْعَظِيمَ الَّذِي لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
transliteration: Astaghfirullāhal-ʿAẓīma alladhī lā ilāha illā Huwa al-Ḥayyul-Qayyūm wa atūbu ilayh
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah the Magnificent, who there is no god but Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I turn to Him

name: Rabbi inna zalamnā anfusanā wa in lam taghfir lanā wa tarḥamnā lanakūnanna minal-khāsirīn
arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
transliteration: Rabbanā innā ẓalamnā anfusanā wa in lam taghfir lanā wa tarḥamnā lanakūnanna minal-khāsirīn
translation: Our Lord, indeed we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers

name: Allāhumma anta rabbī lā ilāha illā anta
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
transliteration: Allāhumma anta rabbī lā ilāha illā anta
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You

name: Khalaqtanī wa anā ʿabduk
translation: You created me and I am Your servant

name: Allāhumma bārik lanā fī mā razaqtanā
transliteration: Allāhumma bārik lanā fī mā razaqtanā
translation: O Allah, bless for us what You have provided us

name: Allāhumma aʿinni ʿalā dhikrik wa shukrik wa ḥusni ʿibādatik
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
transliteration: Allāhumma aʿinni ʿalā dhikrik wa shukrik wa ḥusni ʿibādatik
translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, thank You, and worship You in the best manner

name: Allāhumma ajʿalnī min al-tawwābīn wa ajʿalnī minal-mutaṭahhirīn
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ التَّوَّابِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
transliteration: Allāhumma ajʿalnī min al-tawwābīn wa ajʿalnī minal-mutaṭahhirīn
translation: O Allah, make me among those who repent and make me among those who purify themselves

name: Bismillāhi alladhī lā yaḍurru maʿa ismih shayʾun fīl-arḍi wa lā fīs-samāʾi wa huwa as-samīʿul-ʿalīm
arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
transliteration: Bismillāhi alladhī lā yaḍurru maʿa ismih shayʾun fīl-arḍi wa lā fīs-samāʾi wa huwa as-samīʿul-ʿalīm
translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing

name: Allāhumma anta as-salāmu wa minka as-salāmu
transliteration: Allāhumma anta as-salāmu wa minka as-salāmu
translation: O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes peace

name: Tabārakta yā dhal-jalāli wal-ikrām
translation: Blessed are You, O Possessor of majesty and honor

name: Allāhumma lā māniʿa li-mā aʿṭayta wa lā muʿṭiya li-mā manaʿta
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ لَا مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ وَلَا مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ
transliteration: Allāhumma lā māniʿa li-mā aʿṭayta wa lā muʿṭiya li-mā manaʿta
translation: O Allah, none can prevent what You have willed to bestow and none can bestow what You have willed to prevent

name: Wa lā yanfaʿu dhal-jaddi minka al-jadd
arabic: وَلَا يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ
transliteration: Wa lā yanfaʿu dhal-jaddi minka al-jadd
translation: And no wealth or majesty can benefit anyone, for from You comes all wealth and majesty

name: Allāhumma bāʿid baynī wa bayna khaṭāyāya kamā bāʿadta bayna al-mashriqi wal-maghrib
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ بَاعِدْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ خَطَايَايَ كَمَا بَاعَدْتَ بَيْنَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ
transliteration: Allāhumma bāʿid baynī wa bayna khaṭāyāya kamā bāʿadta bayna al-mashriqi wal-maghrib
translation: O Allah, distance me from my sins just as You have distanced the east from the west

name: Allāhumma naẓẓifnī min khaṭāyāya bil-māʾi was-thalji wal-barad
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ نَظِّفْنِي مِنْ خَطَايَايَ بِالْمَاءِ وَالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ
transliteration: Allāhumma naẓẓifnī min khaṭāyāya bil-māʾi was-thalji wal-barad
translation: O Allah, cleanse me from my sins with water, snow and hail

name: Allāhumma naẓẓifnī min al-khaṭāyā kamā yunaẓẓaf ath-thawb al-abyaḍ min ad-danas
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ نَظِّفْنِي مِنَ الْخَطَايَا كَمَا يُنَظَّفُ الثَّوْبُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ
transliteration: Allāhumma naẓẓifnī min al-khaṭāyā kamā yunaẓẓaf ath-thawb al-abyaḍ min ad-danas
translation: O Allah, cleanse me from sins as a white cloth is cleansed from dirt

name: Samiʿa Allāhu li-man ḥamidah
translation: Allah hears whoever praises Him

name: Rabbanā wa laka al-ḥamd
translation: Our Lord, and to You belongs all praise

name: Allāhumma rabbanā wa laka al-ḥamd
translation: O Allah, our Lord, and to You belongs all praise

name: Amilʾ as-samāwāti wa amilʾ al-arḍ wa amilʾ mā shiʾta min shayʾin baʿd
arabic: مِلْءَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمِلْءَ الْأَرْضِ وَمِلْءَ مَا شِئْتَ مِنْ شَيْءٍ بَعْدُ
transliteration: Amilʾ as-samāwāti wa amilʾ al-arḍ wa amilʾ mā shiʾta min shayʾin baʿd
translation: Filling the heavens and filling the earth and filling whatever You will of anything after

name: Ahl ath-thanāʾi wal-majd
translation: You are worthy of praise and glory

name: Aḥaqqu mā qāla al-ʿabd wa kullunā laka ʿabd
arabic: أَحَقُّ مَا قَالَ الْعَبْدُ وَكُلُّنَا لَكَ عَبْدٌ
transliteration: Aḥaqqu mā qāla al-ʿabd wa kullunā laka ʿabd
translation: Most deserving of what the servant has said, and we are all Your servants

name: Allāhumma lā māniʿa li-mā aʿṭayta wa lā muʿṭiya li-mā manaʿta wa lā yanfaʿu dhal-jaddi minka al-jadd
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ لَا مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ وَلَا مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ وَلَا يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ
transliteration: Allāhumma lā māniʿa li-mā aʿṭayta wa lā muʿṭiya li-mā manaʿta wa lā yanfaʿu dhal-jaddi minka al-jadd
translation: O Allah, none can prevent what You have given, none can give what You have prevented, and no wealth avails its possessor against You

name: Allāhumma aʿinnī ʿalā dhikrik wa shukrik wa ḥusni ʿibādatik
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
transliteration: Allāhumma aʿinnī ʿalā dhikrik wa shukrik wa ḥusni ʿibādatik
translation: O Allah, help me remember You, thank You, and worship You in an excellent manner

name: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āl Muḥammad
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
transliteration: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āl Muḥammad
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad

name: Kamā ṣallayta ʿalā Ibrāhīm wa ʿalā āl Ibrāhīm
arabic: كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
transliteration: Kamā ṣallayta ʿalā Ibrāhīm wa ʿalā āl Ibrāhīm
translation: As You sent blessings upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim

name: Innaka ḥamīd majīd
translation: Indeed, You are Praiseworthy and Glorious

name: Allāhumma bārik ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āl Muḥammad
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
transliteration: Allāhumma bārik ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āl Muḥammad
translation: O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad

name: Kamā bārakta ʿalā Ibrāhīm wa ʿalā āl Ibrāhīm
arabic: كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
transliteration: Kamā bārakta ʿalā Ibrāhīm wa ʿalā āl Ibrāhīm
translation: As You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim

name: Fī al-ʿālamīn innaka ḥamīd majīd
translation: In all the worlds. Indeed, You are Praiseworthy and Glorious

name: Allāhumma maghfirataka awsaʿu min dhunūbī
translation: O Allah, Your forgiveness is vaster than my sins

name: Wa raḥmatuka arjā ʿindī min ʿamalī
transliteration: Wa raḥmatuka arjā ʿindī min ʿamalī
translation: And Your mercy is more hoped for by me than my deeds

name: Allāhumma lā tukhallinī bi-dhanbī
translation: O Allah, do not leave me alone with my sin

name: Wa lā takil nī ilā nafsī ṭarfata ʿayn
arabic: وَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
transliteration: Wa lā takilnī ilā nafsī ṭarfata ʿayn
translation: And do not entrust me to myself for even the blink of an eye

name: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammad an-nabiyy al-ummiyy
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ النَّبِيِّ الْأُمِّيِّ
transliteration: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammad an-nabiyy al-ummiyy
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon our master Muhammad, the unlettered Prophet

name: Wa ʿalā ālihi wa ṣaḥbihi wa sallim
transliteration: Wa ʿalā ālihi wa ṣaḥbihi wa sallim
translation: And upon his family and companions, and grant them peace

name: Allāhumma anta rabbī lā ilāha illā anta khalaqtanī wa anā ʿabduka
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
transliteration: Allāhumma anta rabbī lā ilāha illā anta khalaqtanī wa anā ʿabduka
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You. You created me and I am Your servant

name: Wa anā ʿalā ʿahdika wa waʿdika mastataʿtu
arabic: وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ
transliteration: Wa anā ʿalā ʿahdika wa waʿdika mastataʿtu
translation: I am upon Your covenant and promise as much as I am able

name: Aʿūdhu bika min sharri mā ṣanaʿtu
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ
transliteration: Aʿūdhu bika min sharri mā ṣanaʿtu
translation: I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done

name: Abūʾu laka bi-niʿmatika ʿalayya wa abūʾu bi-dhanbī
arabic: أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي
transliteration: Abūʾu laka bi-niʿmatika ʿalayya wa abūʾu bi-dhanbī
translation: I acknowledge Your favor upon me and I acknowledge my sin

name: Faghfir lī fa-innahu lā yaghfir adh-dhunūba illā anta
arabic: فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
transliteration: Faghfir lī fa-innahu lā yaghfir adh-dhunūba illā anta
translation: So forgive me, for indeed no one forgives sins except You

name: Bismillāh alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa
arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الَّذِي لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
transliteration: Bismillāh alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa
translation: In the name of Allah, besides whom there is no god

name: Rabb al-arsh al-ʿaẓīm
translation: Lord of the mighty Throne

name: Aʿūdhu bi-ʿizzat Allāhi wa qudratih min sharri mā ajidu wa uḥādhir
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِعِزَّةِ اللّٰهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ
transliteration: Aʿūdhu bi-ʿizzat Allāhi wa qudratih min sharri mā ajidu wa uḥādhir
translation: I seek refuge in Allah's might and power from the evil of what I feel and fear

name: Ḥasbiya Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa
arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللّٰهُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
transliteration: Ḥasbiya Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa
translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no god except Him

name: ʿAlayhi tawakkaltu wa huwa rabb al-ʿarsh al-ʿaẓīm
arabic: عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
transliteration: ʿAlayhi tawakkaltu wa huwa rabb al-ʿarsh al-ʿaẓīm
translation: In Him I have placed my trust, and He is the Lord of the mighty Throne

name: Allāhumma kfnī bi-ḥalālika ʿan ḥarāmik
translation: O Allah, make what You have made lawful sufficient for me as opposed to what You have made unlawful

name: Wa aghninī bi-faḍlik ʿamman siwāk
translation: And make me independent by Your bounty of all others besides You

name: Yā muqallib al-qulūb thabbit qalbī ʿalā dīnik
arabic: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
transliteration: Yā muqallib al-qulūb thabbit qalbī ʿalā dīnik
translation: O Turner of hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion

name: Yā muṣarrif al-qulūb ṣarrif qalbī ilā ṭāʿatik
arabic: يَا مُصَرِّفَ الْقُلُوبِ صَرِّفْ قَلْبِي إِلَى طَاعَتِكَ
transliteration: Yā muṣarrif al-qulūb ṣarrif qalbī ilā ṭāʿatik
translation: O Director of hearts, direct my heart to Your obedience

name: Allāhumma rahmat aka arjū fa-lā takilnī ilā nafsī ṭarfata ʿayn
arabic: اللّٰهُمَّ رَحْمَتَكَ أَرْجُو فَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
transliteration: Allāhumma raḥmataka arjū fa-lā takilnī ilā nafsī ṭarfata ʿayn
translation: O Allah, it is Your mercy that I hope for, so do not leave me in charge of my affairs even for a blink of an eye

name: Wa aṣliḥ lī dīnī kullahu
translation: And rectify for me all of my religious affairs

name: Wa lā ilāha illā anta
translation: And there is no god except You

name: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayy al-qayyūm
arabic: اللّٰهُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
transliteration: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayy al-qayyūm
translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer

name: Lā ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa lā nawm
transliteration: Lā ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa lā nawm
translation: Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep
